title: Fix hot water issue
text: Very quick to respond and the fault was rectified very quickly too. Friendly, quality service.

title: Water hammer/pipe vibration issues
text: Steve was very professional, friendly, punctual and accommodating to our requests. In addition to solving our initial problem he also provided free diagnostics and advice for our boiler/water supply which we really appreciated. Will definitely recommend him

title: Bathroom leak fix
text: Brilliant service by a very professional company. They gave us all the information about the leak and found and fixed it without damaging tiling or boxing

title: Boiler not working
text: My boiler suddenly stopped working, I found EVO Plumbing and Heating on line and they came over in the afternoon, inspected it, diagnosed the problem and fixed it with the part that it needed. They were very polite, friendly and helpful and worked quickly to sort the problem. I am relieved to find a reliable company to call and I will call again if I have a problem with anything else in their remit.

title: Gas hob replacement
text: I booked the work to install a replacement hob, but unfortunately the hob was faulty and the work could not be completed on that visit. I had to order a replacement and booked a return visit to connect and install the new hob. This hob too had its problems but Aaron persevered and cannibalised the other hobs to fix the problem. Many thanks.

title: Boiler service
text: First class service as always. Punctual, friendly and thorough.

title: Clear a blocked shower
text: Very grateful to Harvey for the terrific quality service he has provided. We had been struggling for some time with our en-suite shower that takes ages to drain. Using his specialist equipment Harvey was able to completely clear the blockages and has left the shower running better than it ever has done.

title: Replace bath and basin
text: Stephen is a conscientious plumber who takes great pride in his work, delivering an excellent end result. I would always use Steve from EVO plumbing and heating as my first port of call for any job now.

title: Boiler service and gas safety certificate
text: A very Good plumbing and heating company providing a quality reliable and friendly service

title: Clear clogged gully
text: Jamie did a terrific job cleaning the heavily clogged gully drain taking waste from our kitchen. He arrived exactly when he said he would, was extremely pleasant, and did a terrific job cleaning up afterwards

title: Unblock washing machine and kitchen sink pipework
text: This was only a small job, but the response and level of service were exemplary.

title: Fit new towel rail in bathroom
text: We were very pleased with the work done and the price. Would definitely use them again and recommend them.

title: Diagnose and fix water hammer issue
text: EVO plumbing and heating are fantastic! They are professional, responsible, prompt, and charge fairly. Steve diagnosed the cause of the problem and rectified very quickly.

title: Clearing my drain
text: Aaron has just come out and cleared a horrid build up of poo and wet wipes from my drain. I was very pleased with the service from EVO from start to finish. I will definitely recommend them to anyone. Thank you

title: Investigate and fix leak
text: Steve was fantastic. He located the leak very quickly. It was in a very awkward place and he had to disassemble a cupboard to access and resolve. He worked very diligently and did a fantastic reinstatement

title: Clear blockage
text: Fast response. Job completed quickly. Friendly and fair price

title: Drain clearance/repair
text: Work completed on very smelly drainage system. Drain run cleared and then re-configured to prevent repeat problems. Resaonable costs, polite and very clean and tidy. Experienced professional and highly recommended

title: Clear internal pipe blockage
text: Neat and tidy work. A section of pipework had to be altered behind kitchen cupboards to complete properly. This was done neatly and we were kept informed throughout. A friendly and responsive service

title: Fix Gas leak
text: Able to attend to our emergency situation on the same day we phoned. Excellent communication, prompt arrival very pleasant and efficient. We will use EVO again most definitely

title: Circulator pump needed replacing
text: Aaron was great in helping me out with my boiler. I recently moved and wasn't sure about the details of my heating system. Not only was Aaron able to diagnose and fix the problem in the same day, but he also helped me learn more about my heating system and walked me through some things I could do myself to ensure I have heating everywhere in the house. After 1Â½ months living here I finally have heating in my bedroom thanks to Aaron!

title: Install hive system
text: Steve, was able to install my hive system very quickly and gave me a thorough demonstration too. Would definitely use again

title: Fix broken boiler
text: Terrific responsive service. Called this morning to book an appointment and boiler was fixed by lunchtime.

title: Fix Leak at back of toilet
text: Stephen came round very quickly and did an excellent job in locating and remedying a leak issue that had been going on for some time. Thoroughly recommend

title: Clear and repair drain
text: EVO responded to our out of hours emergency call and resolved the issue very quickly with minimum disruption. Brilliant friendly and responsive service

title: Emergency CP12
text: Great service. Got me out of a tight spot after I was let down at the last minute by another company with a tenant due to move in the next day, and needing a CP12 safety check.

title: Blocked soil pipe
text: Excellent service. Put a call in this morning and Jamie turned up within a couple of hours. A very unpleasant job but carried out with humour and professionalism. Would highly recomend.

title: Boiler repair
text: Really appreciate the great effort Steve went to to get our boiler back up and running.

title: Fit new power shower
text: Really pleased with the way the work was progressed and completed. A very friendly company with great work ethics and customer service. Will most definately use again

title: Installation of French drain and a new soakaway
text: EVO organised the work efficiently and were attentive to our needs. Jamie and Steve were punctual, professional and hard working and focussed on the task despite the inclement weather. The project was completed on schedule and at the competitive price agreed. We would recommend EVO and we plan to use the company again in the near future.

title: Replace hot water tank
text: Absolutely superb workforce! I was anicking because we had water pouring through a ceiling but Steve was able to resolve all issues quickly with a very calm and friendly approach. Highly recommended!

title: Replace broken and leaking tap.
text: Tremendous service from Harvey and his plumbing team at EVO. Quick to respond, communicated well, and all plumbing issues resolved very quickly

title: Replace flue
text: Aaron in attended to survey and then a few days later to carry out the work. He was professional and knew what he was talking about its just a sgamr we were mislead by previous engineer (not evo) he even advised me via text regarding another problem later. His customer service was great. I cant speak to the other members of the team as I only had a a brief conversation with someone else and it was aaron who I dealt with. Would I recommend Evo? Yes I would.

title: Replace flu to boiler
text: Aaron completed the work as quoted in timely, friendly and efficient manner

title: Change pump to stop heating noise
text: Really impressed. Diagnosed problem very quickly and had our heating system back up and running within the hour. Terrific weekend service!

title: No water or heating
text: Steve came out same day ,fully checked the system found fault and serviced the boiler.Gave helpful and useful advice .Very polite and knowledgeable man wouldnât hesitate to recommend to anyone.Great service .

title: Replacement of Durgo Valve
text: Our Durgo Valve is located in the loft (the eaves), behind the ensuite shower room. The door to the eaves has been situated in the wrong place to gain access to the Durgo Valve and should have been placed on other side of wall so you can use the storage space. I cannot get a normal size box through the door and over the pipework! Our plumber Nathan was like Houdini, squeezing through the door and bending his body to the right to gain access to the Durgo Valve. We are so grateful that he did it. Well done Nathan, and a good job done. Would recommend EVO plumbing to anyone! A big Thank you.

title: Sorting my hot water
text: Nathan was very friendly and mindful. He gave excellent advice and temporarily sorted the electrical issue so that I at least have some hot water. Nathan had clearly had a long day as he came to me at the end of his day but he remained cheerful and professional. Thank you for helping me out.

title: Install smart thermostat and thermostatic radiator valves
text: Please with all aspects of work. Very approachable workers and worked quickly, neatly and efficiently

title: Fix broken toilet
text: Called EVO plumbing after being let down by another firm. EVO were fantastic, arrived quickly and had the problem sorted within no time

title: Removing an old waste disposal unit and making good the under sink pipe work.
text: I was really impressed by EVO. They quoted a rough charge before booking a visit. Aaron arrived on time, was very nice to have in the house, and did a great job. I will definitely use EVO again and also recommend them to other people.

title: Replace bathroom taps
text: Really happy with all aspects of the work. We have used EVO plumbing before and have always found their work and manner faultless

title: Repair to outside tap
text: Fantastic emergency response service. Have used EVO before and they are 100 percent reliable.

title: Replace syphon in wc
text: Syphon in wc replaced by nathan

title: Annual Service
text: Prompt and efficient

title: Fixing leaking connection to kitchen tap
text: Brilliant. Kitchen filled a.M. With smell of wet chipboard, so phoned urgently. Came that afternoon, fixed the leak with a new connection, and a very reasonable price.

title: Fixed gas central heating
text: Immediate response, very knowledgeable gas engineer, solved the problem immediately and it was a reasonable bill. I would use them again and recommend them.

title: Boiler and cylinder service
text: Nathan was very professional. Very helpful with additional advice. Neat and tidy. Highly recommend him and Evo.

title: Leaks from Taps and pipes
text: I use Evo for my Gas Central Heating yearly maintenance because in my opinion I get an honest and reliable service. This new job was one of those annoying leaky tap and pipes problem so not a horrendous task. Nathan turned up timely and identified the problem quickly. The sink in our toilet is old and he needed a part not held in his van so he went to Screwfix for the required item and returned quickly completing the job with no messing. To me it is really important to get a company that you trust be it on a big or small job I have never had any issues with Evo and can happily recommend.

title: Removing and replacing a central heating radiator in a house
text: Work expertly done, rubbish and redundant radiator taken away and room left spotless

title: Reseal bath
text: The work completed by James was extremely neat and tidy. We are very happy with the work that was done

title: Pre purchase plumbing and heating check
text: The service provided by Steven was excellent. He was extremely accommodating and got the report back to us in very quick time to fit in to our exchange process. The report was clear, informative, and very well written.

title: Resolve non flushing toilet issue
text: A massive thank you to Stephen at EVO plumbing and heating for sorting out our en suite toilet issue. Panic over, our guests now have a working toilet for the Easter break!

title: Replaced washer on hot tap upstairs.
text: Very efficient. They came on time. They were very clean and tidy. We're very pleased. They were the only company who could offer this service on the same day.

title: Fixed outside tap
text: Very courteous and very efficient.

title: Replace water tank in loft
text: Sterling job done by these guys. Old metal tank was really awkward to remove due to weight and position and had actually put off other people from quoting. Steve and his team were brilliant. Removed and replaced the tank with minimum fuss. Work was completed too a high standard and in line with regulations. Very pleased with the work.

title: Install radiators
text: Fantastic service by Steve and his team. They were polite and punctual and carried out the work of replacing all the radiators in our house very efficiently and within the agreed time scale. The rooms were left clean and tidy before they left and all rubbish was cleared and taken away. Their pricing was very reasonable and I would have no hesitation in recommending.

title: Repair leak under basin that was coming through ceiling
text: Thorough work completed by Steve. Very grateful that he could come out to us so quickly on a Sunday. Not only did he fix the leak, but he also released and cleared the water trapped in the ceiling void. Charges were also very reasonable for an out of hours service.

title: Changing a toilet cistern
text: Clean, tidy and efficient. When a small leak was detected the next day, Mark returned and made good promptly and with no fuss

title: Emergency plumbing for leaky toilet pipe
text: Our upstairs toilet feed pipe started leaking late at night and we called EVO at 7am where Harvey was very helpful and organised his teammate Mark to shift his schedule and squeeze us in for the morning for the repair. Mark was very fast with the repair and he also went and got the part needed from the trade shop and made sure it fitted securely to the toilet system. Highly recommend them.

title: Change bathroom radiator
text: Great communication. Very neat and tidy work. Finished work looks fantastic! Would definitely used again an recommend to friends and family

title: Replace Bathroom taps
text: We are really happy with the work. Lovely friendly chap who couldn't do enough for us. Gave us great advice on a couple of other issues and will be getting him round in the near future to complete further work

title: Upgrade Heating System
text: Steve and Darren were a pleasure to have in the house and work with. They were courteous and friendly, and worked very diligently to complete the work to a very high quality. Will definitely use for all further projects.

title: Clear blockage in underground drain and check with CCTV camera
text: Harvey was very responsive and thorough. Arrived within 2 hours of my first call, and had the drain cleared within an hour. He checked the underground drain with his camera and removed some roots that were causing an obstruction. The area was cleaned with a jetter as well which was good

title: Leak on the radiator
text: They came the same day as the water was coming out, they did the job, I am very pleased, good response, I would recommend them, the repair was brilliant

title: The job was to rebuild a support platform under a cold water tank as the existing one was rotten .
text: Evo have always been incredibly reliable and effective, they make the entire process of having repairs done for your boiler so simple and have always been a pleasure to deal with.

text: Work was carried out to an exceptional standard. New pipe run in chrome looks outstanding!

title: Repair leaking kitchen tap. Replace cloakroom tap
text: Mark was punctual, friendly and professional and carried out excellent work. As well as repairing and fitting new taps he used a wet vac to clear the leak we had and left the are spotless.

title: Installed a new kitchen tap
text: They are extremely proficient, they did an excellent job, cleared up all the mess, did a very professional job, the plumber Mark was very helpful and very nice and very polite, cannot praise them highly enough, we would recommend them highly to anyone and use them again.

title: Faulty tap washer repair
text: Mark has done super job, called me to tell when he was arriving, got the part very quickly. I highly recommend

title: Repair leak on outside pipe
text: Quick and tidy work.

title: Leaking toilet
text: Mark came at 5.30, saw the problem, he did not have spares but went to get these locally. And all fixed. Thank you. Very grateful customer.

title: Removing blockage in kitchen sink waste pipe
text: The operative was excellent. He phoned to say he would be delayed which was good. He rapidly diagnosed the problem and where it was before he dealt with it very efficiently. He ensured the work area was clean and tidy and cleaned as he went along. He was polite at all times. We were very pleased with his work.

title: DisconnectedÂ washingÂ machine, cappedÂ hotÂ isolationÂ valve and lubricatedÂ bathÂ taps
text: I would recommend

title: Clearance of surface drains on driveway
text: Top rate service. We had been struggling with our driveway flooding for the past couple of years and had several previous failed attempts to remedy. Finally called EVO and Harvey was able to clear the entire network and demonstrate it running effectively.

title: To install two new radiators - 1 vertical, 1 horizontal design radiators to match.
text: Very, very pleased. We had spoken to other suppliers who were generally unhelpful in helping us to identify the right radiators for our house in terms of size, heat output and overall design and quality. Just as we were giving up hope we came across Evo Plumbing and Heating and arranged for one of their team, Nathan, to come to the house. He was such a great help and very quickly he identified a great solution for us. We could not have got there without him. The two radiators are now installed, look great and most importantly give us all the heat we need in the lounge. Thank you again

title: Repair connection on hot water cylinder
text: After previously being told by another plumbing company we needed our hot water cylinder replaced, we called EVO plumbing and heating as they had a faster turn around time. Service was excellent. Came on same day and were able to repair the faulty connection rather than replacing the hot water cylinder, saving us a lot of money. Highly recommend!

title: Renew soil pipe
text: Aaron was the ideal worker. He did an excellent job, and even did tidying up after a previous contractor left a messy bit of plumbing. A courteous, hard working operative. He cleaned up afterwards, and tested all his installations. Evo is 100% recommended!

title: Drain clearance
text: We were in desperate need of a drain unblocking which was caused by heavy limescale build up. Harvey came out at short notice and used his big pressure jetter to unblock it within minutes. Harvey was very polite and friendly. I can not recommend him and his team enough.  Great job. Will definitely be using again.

title: Boiler kept tripping electrics
text: Brilliant service throughout. Steve arrived within 2 hours of us first calling, having phoned before arrival. Problem was solved very quickly and at a far lower cost than we'd feared. Shall definitely use again.

title: Clearing a blocked drain - so bad that no water could flow through it.
text: I rent a property in Surbiton and tenants reported to me that whenever they emptied the sink, none of the water actually went down the drain as it was so clogged and just overflowed into the front garden. Harvey arrived with a generator and used drain jetting to clear it. Must have been a build up of cooking fats etc, now water flows away easily. Thanks Evo!

title: CCTV Drainage Survey
text: Harvey, Surveyed our drains. He turned up on time and took time to explain what was going on, he supplied a thorough report promptly, which he followed up with a call. Great all round.

title: Boiler service and gas safety
text: Great job. Turned up on time and provided a quality service

title: Replacement of faulty ball valve and float in cold water storage tank
text: Contacted them on 19th October and work booked for morning of 21st. Job carried out very efficiently by Mark who was very polite and considerate. Company initially asked questions to be able to establish the level of urgency of my call and booked in the job accordingly.

title: TOILET FLUSH REPAIRED AND NEW TAPS PUT IN KITCHEN

title: New kitchen tap fitted

title: Fixing leaky tap, fiitting bathroom sink taps and sourcing and fitting new kitchen mixing taps.

title: Replacing corroded leaking ball valve unit in loft header tank with new
text: Mark was running a little late which didn't matter as I was in all day.I was kept informed.No lighting in my loft so not easy working by torchlight.Job didn't take long to complete though.I think I can now rest easy in the knowledge that there won't be any more water escaping and pouring through the ceiling.A good job done.

title: Drain clearance
text: We've been having problems with our kitchen sink draining away (or not actually draining away) and wanted to get to the bottom of it. Harvey arrived on time and quickly setup his equipment including a CCTV camera. He quickly managed to find the route of the problem and cleared the drain which must have had years of build up! Water drains away so quickly now. Only regret is not calling Evo sooner.

text: Incredibly helpful and came out straight away on the bank holiday as we had no hot water so job done earlier than planned. Highly recommend.

title: Drains unblocked and problem identified and rectified
text: Recommended by friend - flooded kitchen floor - Scott came and immediately identified cause. Blocked drain was the main problem which he cleared. Also pointed out there was no vent to the kitchen drainage system which included the dishwasher and washing machine waste. Lots of gurgling and slow movement of water was the norm. Scott installed an AAV (I think it's called) now the gurgling as gone and the water flow improved. Scott is a tidy worker and very polite left the place cleaner than before. Would really recommend .

title: On call advice.
text: Harvey was brilliant! I woke at 5.30 am to a broken boiler, no heat or hot water. Left Harvey a message and he called me by 7am! Unfortunately due to adverse snow conditions he could not drive over but advised me it could be the pipes from boiler outside that had frozen and instructed me over phone. Brilliant advice and boiler now working!!!Â  I have used Harvey many times and think he is so helpful and approachable and despite me contacting him at search an early hour he was courteous, helpful and did not seem to mind at all. He even called abit later to see all was ok!Â  Can't recommend enough!

title: Locate fault with gas central.
text: When I contacted this company because we had no heating to our radiators, Harvey replied within hours, he suggested a visit from his partner Steve to diagnose the problem. Miraculously, Steve located a fault in the system that the Baxi engineer failed to find during his inspection six days earlier. Several other engineers had previously failed to find the fault too. The Baxi engineer said the system needed Power Flushing - a huge expense. Within an hour, Steve discovered the fault to be with the Drayton Wireless receiver. 1st rate response. 1st rate service. Very reasonable cost. Huge thanks.

title: New 35 mm gate valve installed.
text: I'm having a new bathroom fitted and the plumber informed me that the gate valve he had turned off was not turning back on so in a panic I called AHT and spoke with Harvey. He was around the house in less than half an hour and had determined where he could get such an unusual sized part. This was 1130 today and as at 1505 new part was installed and up and running. I cannot thank Harvey enough for his prompt service, understanding of the problem and speediness of repair, I've also got a quote for other work from them and will definitely be getting them back in. Thanks Harvey.

Blockage was rodded out and area inside man hole power washed out and tested for free flow. AHT rep honest, v polite , quick, completely trustworthy and totally focused on the job. text: I rang Harvey at 6pm and he said he could be with me the following morning. He confirmed that he would ring 30 mins before arrival. At 9am I received a call and he was with us at almost exactly 9:30. Harvey worked through torrential rain in order to sort the issue when it would not have been unreasonable to take shelter in his van. I had chosen AHT from the feedback on this site as my partner is housebound and it was critical to get the issue resolved ASAP and he did not disappoint. I had not agreed a price before but he charged an amount well within my expectations.

text: I rang Mr Turtle in a panic as my drains were just about to overflow, which would have been potentially disastrous. He said he was just finishing a job and would come straight over.
